entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 2 except minus 6 inland.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear this evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 2 except minus 6 inland. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Thursday 11 May 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High 17 except 10 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 17 except 10 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 4 in the morning. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Thursday 11 May 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low 6 except plus 1 in low lying inland areas.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the evening. Low 6 except plus 1 in low lying inland areas. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Thursday 11 May 2023
